item.title: Welcome
item.dc:creator: Thomas Lockney
item.content:encoded:
I've finely gotten around to setting up a new site for PDXScala. After much wrestling with Google Sites and mangling of various DNS settings, trying to get their virtual hosting to allow mapping of the pdxscala.org domain, I finally gave up and decide to try out Posterous after seeing the wonderful Implicit.ly site, set up and run by Scala hacker extraordinaire Nathan Hamblen, among others.

Watch this space for more to come!
